title: Video-Based Feedback for Developing Pre-Service Teachers' Reflective Practice Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented course where in-service secondary teachers analyze peer lesson videos and provide feedback to improve social studies instruction

learning_goals: Learners can analyze three or more peer teachers' lesson videos and provide over ten specific feedback points
Learners can provide five or more constructive feedback points linked to specific segments of lesson videos using video annotation tools
Learners can reflect on their teaching practices based on peer feedback and establish three or more improvement plans
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
